stories.title: The First Echo
stories.author: A. Weaver
stories.content: In a forgotten chamber beneath the city, Mara discovered a tape recorder still running—a voice looping endlessly, whispering secrets of events yet to come.

stories.title: Fragments
stories.author: J. Elric
stories.content: Each shard of the broken mirror on the library floor showed a different reality. Only one reflected her face.

stories.title: The Last Transmission
stories.author: L. Harrow
stories.content: The astronauts never came back. But every Sunday at 3:17 AM, NASA's empty frequency still broadcasts a child’s lullaby.
